title: Portfolio Touzinaud
caption: A portfolio website for web designer Valentin Touzinaud, built with Next.js.
description: Valentin Touzinaud, a web designer based in Lyon, commissioned me to develop his personal portfolio website. Built with Next.js, the project focuses on performance and modern web standards while accurately translating his visual design into a fully responsive interface. The result is a fast, polished website that delivers a seamless and engaging user experience across all devices.
skills: Web development (Next.js/GSAP), responsive design, performance optimization

title: Immersive Gallery
caption: A virtual museum experience that users navigate by scrolling through a web page.
description: Immersive Gallery is a virtual museum experience built entirely within a web page. As users scroll, they are guided through a three-dimensional space that gradually reveals artworks and curated collections, creating a sense of movement and exploration. I was responsible for integrating the 3D environment and developing the interactive experience using Babylon.js, with a strong focus on performance, immersion, and smooth user interaction.

title: Init2
caption: A responsive and accessible website for Init2, built from Figma designs.
description: Init2 is a company based in Nantes, France, that commissioned me to rebuild their website. Working closely with designer Marthe Aubineau, I translated her Figma designs into a fully responsive, accessible, and high-performance website. The project focused on clean implementation, usability, and consistency across devices, ensuring an optimal user experience while staying true to the original design vision.
skills: front-end development, motion design (GSAP), responsive design, accessibility

title: Canette 3D
caption: A 3D interactive soda can experience built with Three.js and GSAP.
description: This personal project was developed during my studies as part of Bruno Simonâ€™s Three.js Journey course. The goal was to challenge myself and push my creative and technical skills by combining 3D modeling in Blender with interactive web development using Three.js and GSAP. The project explores real-time animations, user interaction, and smooth transitions to create an engaging and immersive web experience.
skills: Web design, front-end development, motion design (GSAP), 3D modeling (Blender), 3D integration (Three.js)
